lines.text: Remember, the body and the mind do not always travel together.
Where's the girl, Lane? I want her now.
No problem. You can have her alive or dead.
It's you I want, you. Next week you'll die.
You keep your eye on Isabella. OK.
Got it covered. You just go up and fight.
You can do it, David, you're the best.
Pete! I want you to take Mr. Sloan back the hotel, I think he's had enough. And you remind that son of a bitch! he dosen't show up for the fight Isabella disapears for good.
